description: Juicy grilled beef patty with melted cheese, fresh lettuce, and special sauce.
Delicious fettuccine pasta tossed in a rich and creamy Alfredo sauce.
Fresh salmon slices over seasoned rice, served with soy sauce and wasabi.
Classic pizza topped with mozzarella cheese and spicy pepperoni slices.
Soft tortillas filled with grilled chicken, avocado, and homemade salsa.
Rich miso broth with tender noodles, soft-boiled egg, and sliced pork belly.
Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, and feta cheese drizzled with olive oil.
Tender and juicy grilled steak served with garlic butter and mashed potatoes.
Soft dumplings filled with seasoned pork and vegetables, served with soy sauce.
Creamy and rich chocolate ice cream topped with chocolate chips.
Golden brown pancakes served with maple syrup and fresh berries.
Crispy golden-brown fried chicken served with coleslaw and dipping sauce.
